synopsis.text: Immediately after his high school graduation, Itsuki Yuuge's ordinary life takes an extraordinary turn when his cousin and childhood friend, Mahiru, reveals her pregnancy. The pair are then mysteriously transported to the enchanted realm of Granvania, a world plagued by monstrous impurities. In order to return home, Itsuki must embark on a mission to vanquish these malevolent creatures. The only hope for Granvania lies in the creation of "Star Children," powerful beings capable of exorcising the impurities. These Star Children can only be conceived by Itsuki and the twelve celestial "Star Maidens." As Itsuki navigates this fantastical world, he must form bonds with the maidens and father the Star Children to save Granvania and find his way back home.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
